import React from 'react' import '../App.css'; import { useContext } from 'react' import noteContext from '../context/noteContext' export default function Display(props) { const {deletenote} =useContext(noteContext); const { note } = props; const col = ["info", "warning", "primary", "success", "danger", "secondary"] return (
{note.Title}

{note.Description}

{deletenote(note._id)}}>delete edit
//modal

Edit your note

) }
